{"id":1482454348,"question_id":3195,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1734568561,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1482454348/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Separate Black and White Balls","memory":"17.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long minimumSteps(string s) {\n        //0-indexed binary string s of length n, where 1 and 0 represent black and white balls\n        long long swap = 0;\n        int black = 0; //num of blacks.\n        for(int i=0; i<s.length(); i++) {\n            if(s[i]=='0') //white: need to swap to right.\n                swap += (long long)black;   //group all the black(1) balls to the right and all the white(0) balls to the left.\n            else\n                black++;\n        }\n        return swap;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"separate-black-and-white-balls","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
